original_title: “Unbowed & Unafraid” biography of Lasantha Wickrematunge debuts
original_body_lines: First copy of “Unbowed & Unafraid” the biography of Lasantha Wickrematunge written by former wife Raine Wickrematunge (left) being presented to Sandya Eknaligoda at its launch held yesterday at the Sri Lanka Foundation Institute – Pic by Lasantha Kumara
